title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-contained Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs packaged as a single Go binary with a built-in model registry and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: First-party Python client library for chatting with Ollama models, embeddings, and pulling new models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Node and browsers to interact with a local Ollama server.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama as a local LLM for chains, agents, and retrieval pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Drop-in web UI (formerly Ollama-WebUI) for chatting, model management, and RAG uploads; now renamed “Open WebUI”.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Unofficial interactive CLI that wraps the Ollama REST API with conversation history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental VS-Code extension that routes GitHub Copilot requests to a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal retrieval-augmented generation template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector DB.

title: ollama-nvim
summary: Neovim plugin that sends selected code or prompts to Ollama and streams responses into buffers.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder components.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C# SDK for .NET 8 with strongly-typed chat and embedding APIs.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama in a container for CI-based LLM unit tests.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama’s REST API with Tokio and Serde.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app that lets users pick any pulled Ollama model and chat in-browser.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on selected notes and insert generated text.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-hosted Discord bot that answers prompts via Ollama with per-server model settings.

title: ollama-qt
summary: Lightweight cross-platform desktop GUI written in PyQt6 for chatting with Ollama.

title: ollama-kubectl-plugin
summary: Krew plugin that adds “kubectl ollama” commands to list and diagnose Ollama pods.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that routes channel mentions to Ollama and posts streaming responses back.
